1.t: I swear by the Day of Resurrection

2.t: and by the self accusing soul (that you will certainly be resurrected).

3.t: Do men think that We shall never be able to assemble their bones?

4.t: We certainly have the power to restore them even the very tips of their finger.

5.t: In fact, people want to have eternal life in this world.

6.t: He asks, "When will be the Day of Judgment?"

9.t: and the sun and the moon are brought together,

10.t: people will say, "Is there anywhere to run away?"

11.t: Certainly not! There will be no place of refuge.

12.t: The only place of refuge will be with God.

13.t: On that day, people will be informed of all that they had done and all that they were supposed to do.
13.tr: Yunabba-'ul insaanu yawma-'izim bimaa qaddama Wa-akhkhar

14.t: In fact, people are well-aware of their own soul

16.t: (Muhammad), do not move your tongue too quickly to recite the Quran.
16.tr: Laa tuharrik bihee lisaa-naka lita'jala bih

17.t: We shall be responsible for its collection and its recitation.

18.t: When We recite it, follow its recitation (by Us).

19.t: We shall be responsible for its explanation.

20.t: Human beings certainly do not want to pay much attention to the Quran. In fact, they love the worldly life

21.t: and neglect the life to come.

22.t: On the Day of Judgment some faces will be bright,

23.t: and look forward to receiving mercy from their Lord.

25.t: certain of facing a great calamity.

26.t: Some people, certainly, do not believe in it, but when a person's soul reaches up to his throat

27.t: and the angels say, "Who will take away his soul,

28.t: (the angels of mercy or the angels of wrath,)" then, he will realize that it is time to leave this world.

29.t: When legs are twisted around each other,

30.t: that will be the time to be driven to one's Lord.

31.t: The human being does not want to believe the Truth, nor does he want to pray.

32.t: He rejects the faith, turns away

33.t: and haughtily goes to his people.

36.t: For you, the human being of such behavior, will certainly deserve it.

37.t: Does the human being think that he will be left uncontrolled?
37.tr: Alam yaku nutfatam mim maniyyiny yumnaa

38.t: Was he not once just a drop of discharged sperm.

39.t: Was he not turned into a clot of blood? God then formed him and gave him proper shape. From the human being, God made males and females in pairs.

40.t: Does He then not have the power to bring the dead back to life?
40.tr: Alaisa zaalika biqaadirin 'alaaa any yuhyiyal mawtaa
